trans-unit.source: Base designer class for extending the design mode behavior of a root design document that supports nested components.
ComponentDocumentDesigner provides a base class for designers of root design documents that support nested components.

In addition to the methods and functionality inherited from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner> class, ComponentDocumentDesigner implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> interface to provide a root-level design mode view for the associated component, and any nested components.
> [!NOTE] > The root-level design mode view for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> is typically provided by a built-in root designer.
A custom <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> implementation is required to provide a view for other types of root components in design mode.
You can associate a designer with a type using a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>.
For an overview of customizing design time behavior, see [Extending Design-Time Support](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner"></xref> class.
Gets the control for the designer.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> the designer is editing.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner> references.
This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
Gets a value indicating whether the specified tool is supported by the designer.
If a tool is supported, it will be enabled in the toolbox when the designer regains focus.
Otherwise, it will be disabled.
Once a tool is marked as enabled or disabled it cannot be queried again.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> to test for toolbox support.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tool should be enabled on the toolbox; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the document designer doesn't know how to use the tool.
Initializes the designer with the specified component.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to associate with the designer.
Adjusts the set of properties the component will expose through a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref>.

This <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter> interface method override adds a non-browsable, design-time only `boolean` property named "TrayLargeIcon" to this designer's component at design time.
This property is used by the component tray.
An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that contains the properties for the class of the component.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> interface.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"></xref> that indicates a particular view technology.
An object that represents the view for this designer.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner.SupportedTechnologies%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> interface.
An array of supported <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"></xref> values.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService.FilterAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService> interface.
The component to filter the attributes of.
A dictionary of attributes that can be modified.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the set of filtered attributes is to be cached; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the filter service must query again.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService.FilterEvents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService> interface.
The component to filter events for.
A dictionary of events that can be modified.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the set of filtered events is to be cached; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the filter service must query again.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService.FilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService> interface.
The component to filter properties for.
A dictionary of properties that can be modified.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the set of filtered properties is to be cached; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the filter service must query again.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxUser.GetToolSupported%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxUser> interface.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> to be tested for toolbox support.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tool is supported by the toolbox and can be enabled; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the document designer does not know how to use the tool.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxUser.ToolPicked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxUser> interface.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> to select.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the component tray for the designer is in auto-arrange mode.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the component tray for the designer is in auto-arrange mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the component tray for the designer is in large icon mode.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the component tray for the designer is in large icon mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
